description: Shared core module for v1.6 framework, unifying common components for compatibility with specialized branches (e.g., v1.6.A GQFT, v1.6.B Emergent Gravity). Includes logic gates, collider process, phase space, validation ecosystem, known limits, and reference implementation. Hooks for substrate integration via configuration.

conatus_gradient.notes: Drives persistence; integrates with substrate emergence.

core_symbols.emergence: \beta(g) = \mu dg/d\mu; Z ≈ e^{i S_{cl}/\hbar} \sqrt{2\pi i \hbar / |\det \delta^2 S|}

coupled_system.notes: Extends to agent/idea coupling via adaptive κ(t) = κ₀ tanh(α |F_h - F_a|). Recurses via collider self-feed, with depth ≤2 for Gödel compliance.

physics_dynamics_bridge.notes: Motion Law as effective theory over substrate action; conatus emerges from stationary phase. Derives laws via emergence paths, configurable per branch.

logic_gates.description: Topological operations on Free Energy basins; recurse via collider.

collider_process.description: Recursive 4-stage refinement; self-applies for steel-manning. Depth bound=2 (Gödel compliance); coherence ≥0.95.

stage_1_grounding.action: Map to ξ₀ on M; apply D(S).
stage_1_grounding.integration: Anchor in empirics, historical precedents, and tool verifications; configurable for branch substrate.

stage_2_xor_collision.integration: Inject substrate entropy; dissolve ρ via λ_eff.

stage_3_and_synthesis.action: Find ∩ or deeper C; κ coupling.
stage_3_and_synthesis.integration: Emerge ω₃ via flow over branch substrate.

stage_4_invariance_check.integration: Verify across scales; recurse if <0.95, with branch-specific derivations.

collider_process.halt_conditions: ρ > 0.8 (ω₁ trap) or ΔF < 0.01 or depth=2.
collider_process.recursion: Self-feed output to input; gates refine equations; compatible with A/B substrates.

phase_space.description: 3D (ρ, F, κ); ω₃ stable (ρ→0, F_min); ω₁ trap.
phase_space.integration: Basins emergent from substrate RG flows.

known_limits.description: Explicit limitations to ensure epistemological honesty and Gödel compliance.
limits: Cannot escape Gödelian constraints: no complete self-validation.
Computational complexity grows exponentially with depth.
Claims are tiered: Tier 1 (demonstrated, 95% conf.), Tier 2 (plausible, 85% conf.), Tier 3 (speculative, 70% conf.), Tier 4 (aspirational, 50% conf.).

validation_ecosystem.description: Tiered system incorporating internal and external checks.

components.external: Consensus from validators (e.g., Gemini, DeepSeek, human review).
components.historical: Alignment with precedents (e.g., Wolfram, Lisi E8).
components.human_protocol: Implemented: Selection criteria (experts in physics/AI); checklist (coherence, gaps, claims); disagreement resolution (consensus vote); confidence aggregation (weighted average).

implementation_roadmap.description: Prioritized development phases for executable system, shared across branches.

phases.phase_1: Core logic engine (gates, recursion control). Completed with Python classes below.
phases.phase_2: Branch-specific physics module integration (A: GQFT, B: Emergent).
phases.phase_3: Validation framework (external bridges, test suites); hybrid exploration.
phases.phase_4: Experimental predictions and falsification conditions (e.g., if no 6 GW modes in LISA, fail A; if DM needed for rotations, fail B).

reference_implementation.description: Phase 1 complete: Python classes for core logic (extended from v1.4 pseudocode); hooks for branch substrates.

metadata.synthesis: Shared core from v1.5; updated for v1.6 speciation with tool verifications (web_search on Wu/Kastner-Schlatter papers).
